rows.description:
Specify id that can also be used to cancel notification.
If an existing notification with the same ID exists it will be replaced

Datetime object for when to schedule the notification, usually created via intermediate variable calc statement. E.g. 
`@calc(date_fns.addDays(now(),7))`
Title to appear at top of notification. Default title can be set in deployment config
Text to appear in body of notification. Default text can be set in deployment config
